summary: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces his younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Kajol|Dalip Tahil|Rakhee Gulzar|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Siddharth|Johnny Lever|Ananth Narayan Mahadevan|Daboo Malik|Dinesh Hingoo|Adi Irani|Resham Tipnis|Amrit Patel|Sumeet Pathak|Manmauji|Harpal Singh Pali|Sharad Sankla|Raju Srivastava|Asha Singh|Dinyar Contractor|Baby Rupal|Sweety|Ateka|Devendra Pandit|Naushaad Abbas|Akbar Bakshi|Avtar Singh Gullu|Col. Kapoor|Anu Malik|Surendra Rahi|Vinod Rathod|Harpal Singh|Yusuf|Prithvi Zutshi
keywords: pushed from a rooftop|vengeance|murder disguised as suicide|flipping a coin|investigation
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas-Mustan), Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas-Mustan)
title: Baazigar
